statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); branch=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false -c core.fsmonitor=false symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" -c core.useBuiltinFSMonitor=false -c core.fsmonitor=false rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); fi; if [ -n "$used" ] && [ -n "$branch" ]; then echo "$model uses ${used}% on $branch"; elif [ -n "$branch" ]; then echo "$model on $branch"; elif [ -n "$used" ]; then echo "$model uses ${used}%"; else echo "$model"; fi
